ink.miner.task_specific_mining.specific_fit¶

ink.miner.task_specific_mining.specific_fit(miner, X_trans, y)¶

Function to mine task-specific rules :param miner: instance of the RuleSetMiner :param X_trans: Tuple value containing 1) a sparse binary representation, 2) list of indices, 3) column features. :type X_trans: tuple :param y: List containing the labels for each index :type y: list :return: Rules
